name: AbhyasTeacherAssistant
0:
”Alexa open Abhyas Assistant”
”I want spoken modules”
”what is next hour schedule”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: abhyas assistant
des:
Abhyas Teacher Assistant is a submission for the 2020 Amazon Alexa Conversations challenge.

The main aim of this skill is to help students to be able to understand and be comfortable communicating in English using spoken modules created using Alexa conversations. 

As a demo, apart from spoken modules, we currently help students to know their day to day class schedule. 
(Note: The class schedule is currently not customizable and gives default values, as we are still working on the companion app for the skill. This is added as a POC for the idea.)
Note: Please give imaginary names and details in spoken modules as we don't collect any personal details.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
